alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Georgetown; Marlboro; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 5:10AM EST until January 03 at 6:15AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Florence County in northeastern South Carolina... West central Georgetown County in northeastern South Carolina... Southwestern Dillon County in northeastern South Carolina... Darlington County in northeastern South Carolina... Marlboro County in northeastern South Carolina... Williamsburg County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 615 AM EST. * At 509 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kellytown to Cross, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Florence, Bennettsville, Hartsville, Lake City, Darlington, Kingstree, Andrews, Timmonsville, Pamplico, Lamar, Quinby, Brownsville, Cades, Darlington Raceway, Swift Creek, Chavistown, Floyd, New Hope, North Hartsville and Warsaw. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Georgetown; Marlboro; Williamsburg
